page.title: 16Indoor sports in C M
page.content: Indoor sports associated with the Seaside end of the village include snooker and pool played at the C M Institute. The three public houses at Seaside, the Dolphin, the Fo'c's'le and the Marine all have pool tables and teams which compete in the village pools league. Darts is another sport played throughout the village, some public houses having several ladies and mens teams each, who make up the C M Darts League. The Foc's'le is the only one of the three Seaside public houses that has a skittle alley. It's 2 ladies and 3 mens teams play in the Ilfracombe and District Skittles League. There is a heated swimming pool at Whitegates Motel in which anyone may swim for a small fee in the off season months.
